title: Middle East Crisis: Polio Campaign Enters Next Phase in Gaza as Israeli Airstrikes Continue
content: As the first phase of vaccinations ended, an Israeli strike hit a hospital courtyard in central Gaza where people were sheltering, Palestinian news media reported.

title: When Gambia Banned Female Genital Cutting, a Defiant 96-Year-Old Resisted
content: Yassin Fatty, a traditional practitioner of female genital cutting in the West African nation of Gambia, became the first to be convicted there. But her case led to a backlash and a popular campaign to make it legal again.
